channel.title: Portforwarding -__-
channel.description:
Hey Moparscape!
Well, I have an issue.. I am portforwarding right (I know that because my friends can get on my server until I close the source) Once I close the source it acts like the server is offline... Is that supposed to happen? Here is a screenshot of what my Router looks like Portforwarded, http://puu.sh/1hEJi
But now howcome when I come to http://www.canyouseeme.org sometimes it says "Success" and sometimes it says "Connection timed out"
[IMG]http://i1128.photobucket.com/albums/m490/MightyPjer12/Save-1.jpg[/img]
Any help would be appreciated, ~Mike

item.title: Portforwarding -__-
item.dc:creator: @llcookll llcookll
item.description:
@llcookll wrote:

RyRyscape:

When you close the source the server shuts off. How do you not know that lol??

That’s what I thought, Just didn’t know. Thanks for the help anyway!

Read full topic
